__e: Anyway, your dad'll be in a mood, he's been on his own all day.
Knowing Ben's temper when he wakes up, we won't want to be here.
But he was in love with someone, and now he's having mood swings because it went bad, and I think if that someone is Sarah, he could be getting ready to hurt her.
Second, today I'm really cranky and third...
Someone's obviously having a good day.
I had such a good attitude today, - and now it's gone.
She's not in a very good mood, is she?
Are you really in such a good mood, Herr Goring? Or is this your way of handling fear?
I'm tired of pulling out my papers every time some sheriff gets in a mood or some cracker don't like my look.
Look, I know you're bummed about your mom.
Well, you seem pretty chipper for someone who just found out they died for nothing.
I'm just saying this because she's always sad now.
- But her mood's been all over the map for a while. - Thank you so much.
Of course, I do worry a little... but my mood is good.
"Ever since I have found my heart melting..." "my mood has been swell too"
